name: Fast Fashion
description:
Fast Fashion is an Idle Clicker about... well... Fast Fashion...
Fast Fashion is something that's constantly happening in the fashion/clothing industry. Fabrics and materials are constantly being mass produced without a thought on the affect it has on the environment.

This project is made by 9-Volts. A group of 2nd year students studying Bachelor of Software Engineering and Bachelor of Creative Technologies under Media Design School, New Zealand.

CONTROLS
   ⯈  Mouse To Click And Drag To Rotate Preview Objects
   ⯈  ESCAPE To Pause/Unpause
   ⯈  M To Mute/Unmute Background Music


PROGRAMMERS - Bachelor of Software Engineering - Game Programming
   ⯈  Justin Yuen
   ⯈  Benjamin George


ARTISTS - Bachelor of Creative Technologies - Game Art
   ⯈  Che C Hong
   ⯈  Shauna Lane
   ⯈  Stuart Whittaker


ASSETS USED
DoozyUI: Complete UI Management System By ⯈ Doozy Entertainment

Button Sound Effects By ⯈ Freesound

Fonts By ⯈ FontsGeek
